content:
Dreams come true, 
she loves me
to distraction; 
rainbows span
a nuclear sky,
pots of buying-power
and jewel-bearing trees
lie around the bend.
Good tidings
press down
on my skull — 
why should I worry?
 — Something’s ticking
within me, faint
just now
but building up:
will there be
a key (by and by)
between my shoulder-blades?
